snippet: The decision to lump together the leading and supporting actors follows a decision to merge best miniseries with best made-for-TV movie.
abstract: The decision to lump together the leading and supporting actors follows a decision to merge best miniseries with best made-for-TV movie.

headline.main: Emmys to Shrink Number of Acting Awards for TV Movies
headline.print_headline: Movies and Mini-Series To Get Fewer Emmys
